CustomField.description: Identifies if the record should be included in next rollup execution.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK( inspire1__Tracked_Project_Tasks__c )),( inspire1__Entry_Type__c = "Task"),( inspire1__Tracked_Project_Tasks__r.inspire1__Actual_Effort__c < inspire1__Efforts__c)), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: sysFlagForCalc
